annotations.description: Richard Boccato and Michael McIlroy collaborate to bring this popular riff on an old fashioned into existence. For my money it is one of the most solid riffs...
annotations.title: Modern Classic: American Trilogy

textContent:
4 Dashes Orange bitters ( I usually use a 50/50 mix of Regans and Fees)
1 Demerara sugar cube
1oz or 30ml 100 proof Rye Whiskey
1oz or 30ml Lairds 100 proof Applejack
Big Rock Ice
Orange Twist

Muddle bitters, sugar, and a barspoon of soda in bottom of glass. 
Add liquors and ice. 
Stir until combined
Garnish with orange twist
